about_the_game:
Try out a challenging mix of match3, puzzles and quests in the breathtaking game "Season Match 4"! Enjoy nice characters, an amazing plot full of unexpected twists and lots of thrilling match-3 quests. Restore the magical kingdoms after the evil Witch Crow's attack in a variety of wonderful levels! All this and more awaits you in the long-awaited sequel of the popular Season Match series...

- Be part of a gripping story and save your kingdom
- Let the beautiful graphics and detailed animations take you into a wondrous magical world
- Solve numerous Match-3 levels and many extra quests
- This is an absolute must for all Season Match fans

name: Season Match 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ or faster
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ or faster
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
